page.title: 04 NEWSPAPERS
page.content:
A lot of people buy the{Derby Evening {Telegraph.}It is an evening paper. It reports local news mostly, but also has the important national and international news. It has sport in it and a crossword and sometimes another competition. It has the usual advertisement columns.
There are two local weekly papers, the{Ashbourne News Telegraph}and the {Matlock Mercury.}Slightly more people have the{Matlock Mercury}than the {Ashbourne News Telegraph.}A few people have both. These just report local events.
The{Derbyshire Times}is a weekly paper which reports events over the whole county. Not many people buy this paper.
